alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Johnson; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 12:06AM CST until January 10 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to two inches, generally above 2500 feet elevation. Localized amounts up to 3 inches will be possible across the highest elevations above 4000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Mountains of East Tennessee, generally at or above 2500 feet elevation. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of snowfall rates and high winds will reduce visibilities and create periods of hazardous travel conditions across the higher elevations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
